org.forgerock.openidm.servletregistration

Interface ServletRegistration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServletRegistrationSingleton

    public interface ServletRegistration
    Interface for registering servlet filters and servlets in OSGi.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SERVLET_FILTER_AUGMENT_SECURITY_CONTEXT
      Script extension to augment security context
      static String SERVLET_FILTER_CLASS
      The canonical class name for the Filter class.
      static String SERVLET_FILTER_CLASS_PATH_URLS
      Classpath URLs to use for the servlet filter's classloader.
      static String SERVLET_FILTER_INIT_PARAMETERS
      Initialization arguments for the filter.
      static String SERVLET_FILTER_PRE_INVOKE_ATTRIBUTES
      Request attributes to set before the servlet filter's doFilter method is invoked
      static String SERVLET_FILTER_SCRIPT_EXTENSIONS
      Script extensions supported/requested by the filter
      static String SERVLET_FILTER_SERVLET_NAMES
      Servlet names, or aliases, to which the servlet filter applies.
      static String SERVLET_FILTER_SYSTEM_PROPERTIES
      System properties required by the filter.
      static String SERVLET_FILTER_URL_PATTERNS
      URL patterns to which the servlet filter applies.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RegisteredFilter registerFilter(org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue config)
      Parses the given servlet filter configuration and registers a servlet filter in OSGi.
      void registerServlet(String alias, javax.servlet.Servlet servlet, Dictionary initparams)
      Registers a servlet in OSGI
      void unregisterFilter(RegisteredFilter filter)
      Unregisters a servlet filter in OSGi.
      void unregisterServlet(javax.servlet.Servlet servlet)
      Unregisters a servlet in OSGI

    • Method Detail

      • registerFilter

        RegisteredFilter registerFilter(org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue config)
                                throws Exception
        Parses the given servlet filter configuration and registers a servlet filter in OSGi.
        Parameters:
        config - The servlet filter configuration.
        Returns:
        The registered Filter.
        Throws:
        Exception - If a problem occurs registering the servlet filter.

      • unregisterFilter

        void unregisterFilter(RegisteredFilter filter)
                      throws Exception
        Unregisters a servlet filter in OSGi.
        Parameters:
        filter - The registered Filter.
        Throws:
        Exception - If a problem occurs unregistering the servlet filter.

      • registerServlet

        void registerServlet(String alias,
                   javax.servlet.Servlet servlet,
                   Dictionary initparams)
                     throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                            org.osgi.service.http.NamespaceException
        Registers a servlet in OSGI
        Parameters:
        alias - name in the URI namespace at which the servlet is registered
        servlet - the servlet object to register
        initparams - initialization arguments for the servlet or null if there are none. This argument is used by the servlet's ServletConfig object.
        Throws:
        Exception - if a problem occurs registering a servlet filter
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        org.osgi.service.http.NamespaceException

      • unregisterServlet

        void unregisterServlet(javax.servlet.Servlet servlet)
        Unregisters a servlet in OSGI
        Parameters:
        servlet - the servlet to be unregistered
